item.title: Inventory-X: Overview
item.description:
Inventory Overview Inventory allows Channel Managers and Hotel Product Distributors to push their product into a TravelgateX database, thus making it available for the TravelgateX Buyers. How does it work? Channel Managers and Hotels will push data to Inventory. Inventory receives the data from the different channels and stores it in a common structure. Then, this product can be consumed in 3 different ways by TravelgateX Buyers:
[...]

item.title: Inventory-X: Extranet
item.description: <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/overview/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-info-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Overview</h3> <p>Inventory extranet Overview</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/load-product/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-laptop"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Load your inventory</h3> <p>Steps and manual to load your inventory using the extranet</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/tools/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-wrench"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Tools</h3> <p>Tools that will help you manage your inventory</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/faq/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-question-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">FAQ</h3> <p>Frequently asked questions about the Inventory-X extranet</p> </div> </div> </a>

item.title: Inventory-X: Release Notes
item.description:
2020-11-25 Now it’s possible to load free charges for child and baby pax using the Inventory-X extranet. This feature allows buyers to set, at rate level, free children or babies when Channel Managers are not able to load it from their side. More info. 2020-11-19 Now it’s possible to create hotels using the Inventory-X extranet. This feature allows administrators users to create a hotel not listed in our data base yet without having to open a ticket to our Customer Care Team.
[...]
